# patchDVI

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of patchDVI is to support previewer forward and reverse search between Sweave, knitr or R Markdown 
source and .dvi, .pdf or .html output.

This project was originally hosted on R-forge; see

  https://r-forge.r-project.org/projects/sweavesearch/
  
for the older history.
